### wilcoxontest
Example:
```{r}
(w1 <- wilcoxon(c(1,2,3), c(6,5,4)))
w21 <- rnorm(15, 0, 1); w22 <- rnorm(15, 5, 1)
(w2 <- wilcoxon(w21, w22))
```



Comparison:
```{r}
wilcox.test(c(1,2,3), c(6,5,4))
wilcox.test(w21, w22)
```

### spearmantest
Example:
```{r}
spearmantest(c(1,2,3), c(6,5,4))
spearmantest(w21, w22)
```



Comparison:
```{r}
# built-in
cor(x = w21, y = w22, method = "spearman")

```
